messages.title: ONLY the Lib Dems will balance the books.
messages.content: The Lib Dems are committed to balancing the books by 2018. They will secure the recovery and bring down Britain's debt.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems pledge to balance the books and eliminate the deficit by 2018, ensuring economic recovery and reduction of national debt.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems are committed to balancing the books by 2018, securing the recovery, and bringing down Britain's debt.

leaflet.personalStatement: A 24 year record of delivering for Winchester

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018.

quotes.text: The Lib Dems have matched the Conservative commitment to eliminate the deficit by 2018.
